::Magmatron::

    "Actullay that was in the plan." Magmatron said. "Now if you follow me I 
will lead you to my base. And you should be impressed with it's weapon 
systems. Unfortunatly it cannot fly. But it might be able to again if I can 
get the right parts." Magmatron says to both Shredder and Mantella.

_____________________________________________________________________
::Bazooka::

    Back at the Destron base Bazooka looks into scematics of the Ark. He 
knows Magmatron's plans and he wishes to help. Looking through each room he 
makes note of what might be useful. As he comes to one room his eyes light up.
    "Commander Magmatron," Bazooka says into his comm. "I've found something 
that you might be interested in."
    "Good, will you divert power back to my conference room?" Magmatron asks 
Bazooka.
    "No problem." He hits a few keys and the lights come back on in the 
conference room. "All set, I take it we have visitors?"
    "Yes treat them well, Bazooka. Magmatron out."
